name: Still Loving You
content: To win back your love again
I will be there  i will be there
Can bring back your love again
I will be there  i will be there
奋战 宝贝 奋战
To win back your love again
I will be there  i will be there
Can break down the wall someday
终有一天能推倒这面墙
I will be there  i will be there
All the way from the start
The things that killed our love
改变磨灭我们爱恋的东西
Pride has built a wall  so strong
尝试 宝贝 尝试
To trust in my love someday
相信我的爱 终有一天
I will be there  i will be there
I will be there  i will be there
All the way from the start
The things that killed our love
改变磨灭我们爱恋的东西
Pride has built a wall  so strong
All the way from the start
The things that killed our love
改变磨灭我们爱恋的东西
没错 我伤到你的骄傲了
我也知道你经历了什么
You should give me a chance
我值得你再给一个机会
我还爱着你 我需要你爱我
我还爱着你 我需要你爱我
Need your love  still loving you
需要你爱我 还爱着你
